short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple tool to add and check tasks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Goal List Manager is an extension for efficient time management. With this program, users can set deadlines and easily check or delete tasks. It is designed with a user-friendly interface, making it accessible for beginners.

As this program was created by a novice developer, we appreciate your understanding and encourage you to provide feedback if you encounter any issues. Thank you!
